languages.text: "Вольный Торговец, как вы могли!" {n}Кассия негодующе хмурит тонкие брови.{/n} "Все это время вы направляли меня, собственным примером учили принимать сложные решения самостоятельно. А сегодня нахально ворвались в мою беседу с эльдарами и перебили их. Как... подло!"

traits.locale_text: "Вольный Торговец, как вы могли!" {n}Кассия негодующе хмурит тонкие брови.{/n} "Все это время вы направляли меня, собственным примером учили принимать сложные решения самостоятельно. А сегодня нахально ворвались в мою беседу с эльдарами и перебили их. Как... как бескультурно и подло!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Rogue Trader! How dare you?" {n}Cassia frowns indignantly.{/n} "All this time, you guided me, you taught me by example that I have to learn to make difficult decisions on my own. Yet, today you intervened in my conversation with the Aeldari and put them all to death. That was... dishonourable of you!"
languages.original_text: "Вольный Торговец, как вы могли!" {n}Кассия негодующе хмурит тонкие брови.{/n} "Все это время вы направляли меня, собственным примером учили принимать сложные решения самостоятельно. А сегодня нахально ворвались в мою беседу с эльдарами и перебили их. Как... подло!"

traits.locale_text: "Rogue Trader! How could you?" {n}Cassia frowns indignantly.{/n} "All this time, you guided me, you taught me by example that I have to learn to make difficult decisions on my own. Yet today you intervened in my conversation with the Aeldari and put them all to death. That was... dishonourable of you!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

Yet, today you intervened in my conversation with the Aeldari and put them all to death. That was... dishonourable of you!"

Yet, today you intervened in my conversation with the Aeldari and put them all to death. That was... dishonourable of you!"

Yet, today you intervened in my conversation with the Aeldari and put them all to death. That was... dishonourable of you!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「自由開拓者！よくもそんなことを言えますね？」{n}カシアは憤然と顔をしかめる。{/n}「今まであなたはあたくしを導いてくれました。難しい判断を自ら行うべきだと、手本となって教えてくれました。ですが、今日あなたは、あたくしとアエルダリとの会話に口を出し、全員を死に至らしめた…それは…不名誉なことではないのですか！」
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader! How dare you?" {n}Cassia frowns indignantly.{/n} "All this time, you guided me, you taught me by example that I have to learn to make difficult decisions on my own. Yet, today you intervened in my conversation with the Aeldari and put them all to death. That was... dishonourable of you!"

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者！よくもそんなことを言えますね？」{n}カシアは憤然と顔をしかめる。{/n}「今まであなたはあたくしを導いてくれました。難しい判断を自ら行うべきだと、手本となって教えてくれました。ですが、今日あなたは、あたくしとアエルダリとの会話に口を出し、全員を死に至らしめた…それは…不名誉なことではないのですか！」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “行商浪人！你怎么能这么做？”{n}卡西娅怒不可遏地皱着眉。{/n}“一直以来，你都在引导我。是你言传身教地告诉我，说我必须学会自己做出艰难的决定。可今天，你却打断了我和艾达灵族的谈话，还把他们全都处死了。这实在是……太可耻了！”
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader! How dare you?" {n}Cassia frowns indignantly.{/n} "All this time, you guided me, you taught me by example that I have to learn to make difficult decisions on my own. Yet, today you intervened in my conversation with the Aeldari and put them all to death. That was... dishonourable of you!"

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人！你怎么能这么做？”{n}卡西娅怒不可遏地皱着眉。{/n}“一直以来，你都在引导我。是你言传身教地告诉我，说我必须学会自己做出艰难的决定。可今天，你却打断了我和艾达灵族的谈话，还把他们全都处死了。这实在是……太可耻了！”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande} ! Comment osez-vous ? {n}s'exclame Cassia en fronçant les sourcils d'un air indigné.{/n} Tout ce temps, vous m'avez guidée, vous m'avez montré qu'il me faudrait parfois prendre des décisions difficiles, et pourtant, aujourd'hui, alors que j'étais en pleine conversation avec les Aeldaris, vous êtes {mf|intervenu|intervenue} et vous les avez tous massacrés. C'était... très déshonorable de votre part ! »
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader! How dare you?" {n}Cassia frowns indignantly.{/n} "All this time, you guided me, you taught me by example that I have to learn to make difficult decisions on my own. Yet, today you intervened in my conversation with the Aeldari and put them all to death. That was... dishonourable of you!"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande} ! Comment osez-vous ? {n}s'exclame Cassia en fronçant les sourcils d'un air indigné.{/n} Tout ce temps, vous m'avez guidée, vous m'avez montré qu'il me faudrait parfois prendre des décisions difficiles, et pourtant, aujourd'hui, alors que j'étais en pleine conversation avec les Aeldaris, vous êtes {mf|intervenu|intervenue} et vous les avez tous massacrés. C'était... très déshonorable de votre part ! »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «¡Comerciante Independiente! ¿Cómo se atreve?». {n}Cassia frunce el ceño, indignada.{/n} «Durante todo este tiempo, me ha enseñado con su ejemplo que debo tomar mis propias decisiones difíciles, y, sin embargo, ha intervenido en mi conversación con los Aeldari y los ha matado a todos. Eso ha sido... ¡una deshonra para usted!».
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader! How dare you?" {n}Cassia frowns indignantly.{/n} "All this time, you guided me, you taught me by example that I have to learn to make difficult decisions on my own. Yet, today you intervened in my conversation with the Aeldari and put them all to death. That was... dishonourable of you!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Comerciante Independiente! ¿Cómo se atreve?». {n}Cassia frunce el ceño, indignada.{/n} «Durante todo este tiempo, me ha enseñado con su ejemplo que debo tomar mis propias decisiones difíciles, y, sin embargo, ha intervenido en mi conversación con los Aeldari y los ha matado a todos. Eso ha sido... ¡una deshonra para usted!».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}! Wie könnt Ihr es wagen?" {n}Cassia runzelt entrüstet die Stirn.{/n} "Die ganze Zeit über habt Ihr mich durch Euer Beispiel gelehrt, dass ich lernen muss, schwierige Entscheidungen allein zu treffen. Doch heute habt Ihr Euch in mein Gespräch mit den Aeldari eingemischt und sie alle getötet. Das war ... unehrenhaft von Euch!"
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader! How dare you?" {n}Cassia frowns indignantly.{/n} "All this time, you guided me, you taught me by example that I have to learn to make difficult decisions on my own. Yet, today you intervened in my conversation with the Aeldari and put them all to death. That was... dishonourable of you!"

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}! Wie könnt Ihr es wagen?" {n}Cassia runzelt entrüstet die Stirn.{/n} "Die ganze Zeit über habt Ihr mich durch Euer Beispiel gelehrt, dass ich lernen muss, schwierige Entscheidungen allein zu treffen. Doch heute habt Ihr Euch in mein Gespräch mit den Aeldari eingemischt und sie alle getötet. Das war ... unehrenhaft von Euch!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Hür Tacir! Bu ne cüret!" {n}Cassia, öfkeyle kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Kaç zamandır kılavuzum oldun. Seni örnek alıp kendi başıma nasıl zor kararlar vereceğimi öğrendim. Oysa bugün Aeldarilerle aramdaki konuşmayı bölüp hepsini infaz ettin. Bu yaptığın... Çok büyük bir şerefsizlikti!"
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader! How dare you?" {n}Cassia frowns indignantly.{/n} "All this time, you guided me, you taught me by example that I have to learn to make difficult decisions on my own. Yet, today you intervened in my conversation with the Aeldari and put them all to death. That was... dishonourable of you!"

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacir! Bu ne cüret!" {n}Cassia, öfkeyle kaşlarını çatıyor.{/n} "Kaç zamandır kılavuzum oldun. Seni örnek alıp kendi başıma nasıl zor kararlar vermem gerektiğini öğrendim. Oysa bugün Aeldarilerle aramdaki konuşmayı bölüp hepsini infaz ettin. Bu yaptığın... Çok büyük bir şerefsizlikti!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
